channel.title: [517] Bloodex - PvP Server [517]
channel.description:
[b][517] - Bloodex - PvP [517] [/b]
[b]Info[/b] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/15ceft0.jpg[/img] Chatbox: http://bloodexf.tk/ Vote: http://vote4bloodex.tk/ [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/s27hxu.gif[/img] Download: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=0EC91X5N
[b]Features[/b] - 24/7 Uptime - 100% KBD - 95% God Wars - 100% Duel Arena - 80% Bounty Hunter - 95% Fight Caves - 98% Clan Wars
[b]Normal Commands[/b] ::pvp ::easts ::item (item id) (ammount) ::starter ::Setlevel (level id) (level) ::Toggle (for pures) ::teleports ::checkkills ::sellitem (item id) ::sellall (sells inventory) ::checkprice (item id) ::restorespecial (only works in safe zones ::edgepk ::sit
[b]Weapon Effects[/b] Saradomin Godsword heals if you hit with special. Bandos Godsword drains opponents defense when hit with special. Zamorak Godsword freezes opponent. - Guthans heals randomly per hit. Dharoks hits hard at random times. Karils drains opponents defence randomly. Torag drains opponents run ranomly.
[b]- And Much More I Just Dont Feel Like Typing Everything -[/b]

item.title: [517] Bloodex - PvP Server [517]
item.dc:creator: @Bloodex Bloodex
item.description:
@Bloodex wrote:

[517] - Bloodex - PvP [517]

Info
Chatbox: http://bloodexf.tk/
Vote: http://vote4bloodex.tk/
Download: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=0EC91X5N

Features

  • 24/7 Uptime
  • 100% KBD
  • 95% God Wars
  • 100% Duel Arena
  • 80% Bounty Hunter
  • 95% Fight Caves
  • 98% Clan Wars

Normal Commands
::pvp
::easts
::item (item id) (ammount)
::starter
::Setlevel (level id) (level)
::Toggle (for pures)
::teleports
::checkkills
::sellitem (item id)
::sellall (sells inventory)
::checkprice (item id)
::restorespecial (only works in safe zones
::edgepk
::sit

Weapon Effects
Saradomin Godsword heals if you hit with special.
Bandos Godsword drains opponents defense when hit with special.
Zamorak Godsword freezes opponent.

Guthans heals randomly per hit.
Dharoks hits hard at random times.
Karils drains opponents defence randomly.
Torag drains opponents run ranomly.

- And Much More I Just Dont Feel Like Typing Everything -

100% Working Dragon Claws Special

Full Zuriel

Full Statius

Full Vesta

Full Morrigan
